notes.title: Notes
notes.p: Author contributions. A. F., P. N., I. D., and C. A. D. conceived and designed the experiments and wrote the paper. A. F. performed the experiments and analyzed the data.

Acknowledgments. The study was based on data routinely collected by national and international staff in conjunction with World Health Organization (WHO). The authors thank all those involved in collecting, entering, and cleaning the data, including members of the WHO Ebola Response Team.

Financial support. This work was supported by the Commonwealth Scholarship Commission, the UK Medical Research Council and the Department for International Development (center funding) (grant number MR/R015600/1), the National Institute of Health Research, and an Imperial College Junior Research Fellowship.

Potential conflicts of interest. The authors report no potential conflicts of interest. All authors have submitted the ICMJE Form for Disclosure of Potential Conflicts of Interest. Conflicts that the editors consider relevant to the content of the manuscript have been disclosed.
